title: Sweet Potato, Leek & Lentil Casserole
directions: Heat the coconut oil in a saucepan. Add finely chopped onion, crushed garlic, cumin, coriander, fenugreek seeds, turmeric, ginger and curry powder. Fry gently until soft to release aromas.
Peel sweet potato and cut in 1cm dice [0.4 inch].
Cut trimmed leeks in 1/2cm slices [0.2 inch]. Wash to remove dirt. Drain.
Add sweet potatoes, leeks, lentils and can tomatoes to the onion mixture.
Top with vegetable stock. Bring to a boil then lower to a medium heat and covered for 20-30 mins until vegetables and lentils are soft. They should still have a bite.
When the casserole is cooked, add lemon juice and season to taste.
Serve with warm pitta bread and fresh coriander leaves sprinkled on top.
ingredients: 600ml vegetable stock [1 pint / US 2 Â½ cups]
